CS:S is just fun to play, even today.
Astonishingly,
within 17 years, there were and still are, very few cheaters, if you find some, they usually get banned quickly on most servers. 

On the contrary: 

CS:GO. A game infested with ret*rds and hackers
A game where I met more cheaters in a couple of matches, back to back, than in my entire CS 1.6 and CS:S experience.


Yours Sincerely
